name: Odoya
description: In this game, players take on the role of Jana, a 10-year-old girl who was sheltered by Yemanjá when the actions of men caused a great flood and the end of the first humanity. When humanity resurged and began to grow again, men once again forgot the importance of respecting the forces of nature, and Jana needs to take care of the environment, save the animals, and even the humans themselves from the environmental disasters they cause. This game will take you on a journey through a rich and vibrant world inspired by Afro-Brazilian mythology. Will you help Jana in her mission to protect the earth and its inhabitants?
developers: Victor Cayres: Soluções Lúdicas e Narrativas Transmídia
publishers: Victor Cayres: Soluções Lúdicas e Narrativas Transmídia
